name: Principal CI (CVM) Consultant
description:
Requirements:

  • As a Principal Business Consultant, you will be responsible for supporting sales activities of SAS Customer Intelligence solutions. You will:

  • support the definition of a CRM vision and roadmap
  • define industry (banking, telco as priority) and client specific business processes
  • gather high-level business requirements and propose customers with appropriate SAS solutions
  • manage SAS solutions customization for demo workshops – ability to contribute to demos as an advantage
  • manage SAS Customer Intelligence pilot projects or POCs implementation
  • co-facilitate trainings/workshops client-side
  • work on both local and international project assignments
  • work in diverse/international teams for large national and multinational companies in financial, telecommunication, FMCG and retail services
  • assist the organization’s customer facing functions with the transformation of their customer processes and technologies, in domains such as sales, marketing, and customer service
  • contribute to fulfill the sales target in the area of SAS Customer Intelligence
Requirements:
  • You worked as a consultant or manager in CRM, CVM or customer analytics in industry and/or consulting company.
  • You have a strong interest in sales, marketing and customer service business processes supported by analytics;
  • You show a keen interest in technology and understand how it can be used to enable business processes;
  • You are a flexible and dynamic team player;
  • You feel comfortable in new environments and are not afraid to speak up;
  • You have strong communication skills, including business writing and presentation skills;
  • You are open-minded and willing to learn
  • You are fluent in Russian and have a good communication skills in English.
We offer:
  • Competitive salary and bonus system based on the interview results
  • Medical insurance
  • Mobile phone charges
  • Remote job for a pandemic period
